title: The Pygmalion Is Planting Seeds - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Amnesia   Brainwashing   Cannibalism   Corruption   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Gore   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Murders   Obsessive Love   R-18   Stubborn Protagonist   Twisted Personality
author: Bouki Shiiya   坊木椎哉
description:
The Pygmalion Is Planting Seeds is a story following the life of a graduate student who failed all university entrance exams and is thus left looking for another chance the whole year. After a former classmate girl he likes went missing, he decided to spend his free time looking for her, without having the least idea about what was going to happen to him.

This is a story of blood and flowers, beauty and gore. Following the story of Mamesaki Kuuya as a protagonist and using a little spice of supernatural, it shows you how love could turn a person blind.>
